comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Maybe Edward T. Fairchild (d. 1917), third president of the New Hampshire College of Agriculture and Mechanical Arts, in office from 1912 until his death. Before 1912, he was the Kansas state superintendent of public instruction. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edward_T._Fairchild There was also an Edward T. Fairchild (1872-1965) who was a Wisconsin Supreme Court Justice, 1930-1957, but they don't look anything alike, and this guy looks too old for an 1872 birthdate: www.wicourts.gov/about/judges/supreme/retired/fairchild.htm

comment.author: 35277872@N05
comment._content: pennylrichardsca:  Thanks for the information. This photograph matches a Bain file print that indicates the photo is of Edward Thomson Fairchild, 1854-1917. Thanks for the information. We can add that to the description when we update it.
